entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023
